oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Mixed Methods Search Filters December 2016
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Slater, Linda
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Provides search filters to retrieve mixed methods studies from Ovid, EBSCO, ProQuest and Web of Sciences databases as well as the Scopus database.
